description: This file defines a health check endpoint in a Flask web application. It sets up a Blueprint and a class with a GET method to verify if the service is healthy.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView that provides a simple health status response.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests and returns a JSON message indicating the service is healthy.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
